effect_entries.effect: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

effect_entries.effect: This Pokémon inflicts triple damage with critical hits, rather than the usual double damage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Strengthens critical hits to inflict 3× damage rather than 2×.

effect_entries.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being poisoned.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning attacking Pokémon on contact.
